Does this comment contain discriminatory intent toward other people or groups?
Instruction: Code as Yes (1) when the comment contains discrimination towards other people or groups, based on nationality (i.e. xenophobia), sexual preference (e.g. homophobia), race (i.e. racism), religion, gender, or economic-social status.
Example 1 (homophobia, code as Yes (1)): ‘Pink water? Damn those liberals. Now they are turning the water gay.’
Example 2 (racism, code as Yes (1)): ‘@Cosmo Joe The jews are a real threat, have you heard of the USS liberty incident?’

Respond with only the predicted class (0 or 1) of the request.
